com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

Class RequestOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.RequestOptions

  • public final class RequestOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates options that can be specified for a request issued to the Azure DocumentDB service.
